sections.heading: Animals; cruelty, prevention of
sections.text: A city of the second class shall have the power by ordinance to prohibit and punish cruelty to animals.SourceLaws 1881, c. 24, § 1, p. 197;R.S.1913, § 5032;C.S.1922, § 4201;C.S.1929, § 17-140;R.S.1943, § 17-138;Laws 2017, LB133, § 30.
